Sunhawk:  FOR THE GLORY OF THE MAXIMALS!

He went to Beast Mode dodging the missile as he flew
up in the air.  He flew over Inferno and
de-transformed.  He then dropped a grenade on him and
flew back to about where he had been and went back to
robot mode.

--- catmastero <catmastero@...> wrote:
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., Kyle Stewart <dewboy30816@y...>
> wrote:
> > OOC: How'd he dodge it if he was blind.
> > 
> > BIC:  Very glad blindness tends to ruin aim
> Sunhawk
> > aimed another blast at Infernos chest and one to
> his
> > left, one to his right, one above him, and one
> below
> > him.  Then seeing another Preicon was trying to
> flank
> > him he planted a grenade (not smoke this time)
> where
> > he was likely to step on it and blow himself up. 
> Even
> > if he didn't Sunhawk could detonate it with a
> laser.
> > 
> OOC: He only lost one eye, so he can still see out
> of the other one.
> IC:
> Inferno fell from the sky after being hit afew
> times, now badly 
> dented "For the glory of the colony" he said and
> launched a rocket at 
> Sunhawk.
> 
>
